mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (notc_title, notc_content, notc_createdAt, notc_updatedAt, notc_views, notice_uuid, notice_file_name) VALUES (#{notc_title}, #{notc_content}, #{notc_createdAt}, #{notc_updatedAt}, #{notc_views}, #{notice_uuid}, #{notice_file_name})
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notc_title = #{notc_title}, notc_content = #{notc_content}, notc_updatedAt = #{notc_updatedAt}, notice_uuid = #{notice_uuid}, notice_file_name = #{notice_file_name} WHERE notc_id = #{notc_id}
mapper.select: select * from notice order by notc_id desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT row_number() over (order by notc_id desc) as notc_no, notc_id, notc_title, notc_content, notc_createdAt, notc_updatedAt, notc_views FROM notice ) row_notice WHERE row_notice.notc_no BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT notc_id, LEAD(notc_id, 1, 9999) OVER (ORDER BY notc_id) AS next, LAG(notc_id, 1, 9999) OVER (ORDER BY notc_id) AS last, notc_title, LEAD(notc_title, 1, 'No next title') OVER (ORDER BY notc_id) AS nexttitle, LAG(notc_title, 1, 'No previous title') OVER (ORDER BY notc_id) AS lasttitle FROM notice ORDER BY notc_id DESC ) AS derived_table_alias WHERE notc_id = #{notc_id}
